statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_points, sustainable_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE sustainable_purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM loyalty_program WHERE sustainable_purchase_amount < 50.00 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, sustainable_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_points BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY sustainable_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE sustainable_purchase_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND is_sustainable = true;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE AND category = 'electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points > 500 AND name ILIKE 'J%'
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS purchase_count FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING purchase_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE total_points > 100;
SELECT id, category, is_sustainable FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, points_awarded, reward_date FROM rewards WHERE points_awarded >= 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, pr.points_awarded FROM customers c JOIN purchases pur ON c.id = pur.customer_id JOIN products p ON pur.product_id = p.id JOIN rewards pr ON c.id = pr.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT rewards.customer_id, customer_name, reward_points FROM rewards JOIN customers ON rewards.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
